title: Eternity, My Love
description: Eternity, My Love is the story of Corrine Whitmore, a young woman whose once-perfect life suddenly is filled with tragedy. A twist of fate allows her to find the love of her life, William Darcy, but he has a secret that could possibly destroy them both. Together they are complete; they find the kind of peace, love and devotion most people only dream about. They live for each other. William’s past and Corrine’s future will put them to the ultimate test. What price will they pay to stay together for eternity? Will they even get the chance?
author: Heather Caudill McBride
